title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.10 - Passengers prohibited from entering or exiting aircraft until engines shut down
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.10 - Passengers prohibited from entering or exiting aircraft until engines shut down

State Regulations

No passenger shall enter or exit a single engine aircraft
(except helicopters) until the engine has been shut down. No passenger shall
enter or exit an aircraft having more than one engine unless the engine(s) on
the side of the aircraft where entry or exit is made is/are shut
down. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
